column2: Ceridian HCM Holding, Inc. engages in the development of human capital management software. The company is headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota and currently employs 4,444 full-time employees. The firm operates in two segments, HCM and LifeWorks. Through the HCM segment the Company develops its flagship product Dayforce. Dayforce is a cloud HCM platform that provides human resources (HR), payroll, benefits, workforce management, and talent management functionalities. The platform optimizes the management of entire employee lifecycle in an organization. The firm also provides Powerpay, a cloud HR and payroll solution for the Canadian small business market through HCM. Through the HCM segment, the Company also offers Bureau HCM solutions through the service-bureau model. The company includes three services lines, such as payroll, payroll-related tax filing, and outsourced HR solutions. The Company, through the LifeWorks segment, offers employee assistance, wellness, recognition, incentive programs, and employee engagement analytics.
